meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Anthony Flores Alexis Hawley Tom Nissley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6043.

td.p: Anthony Flores, a campaign consultant from Washington, D.C.
Alexis Hawley, an attorney originally from Winter Park, Florida
Tom Nissley, an online books editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,801)

tr.td: ART
ONE FACT AMONG THE FALSE GOSSIP
MALL-EDGE
THE CITY'S MAYOR
LET THE GAMES BEGIN
"D" BRIEFING

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'It can mean the closely woven durable cloth on which oil paintings are made or refer to the painting itself')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: It can mean the closely woven durable cloth on which oil paintings are made or refer to the painting itself

')
